summary: Comprehensive testing of VC Deal Intelligence System with Website Intelligence feature completed. All backend APIs and frontend UI components tested successfully.

minor_issues.issue: Test company website crawl shows minimal data (1/35 pages crawled) due to fake URL - this is expected behavior

passed_tests: Dashboard stats endpoint (/api/dashboard/stats) with proper company counts
Companies list endpoint (/api/companies) returning TechVault AI
Company detail endpoint (/api/companies/{id}) with full enrichment data
Company scoring endpoint (/api/companies/{id}/score) with 6 dimensions including Website Intelligence
Website intelligence endpoint (/api/companies/{id}/website-intelligence) with 7 AI agents
Dashboard page loads with stats cards and recent companies
Upload page has working drag-and-drop interface
Company detail page navigation and loading
All 6 tabs present: Overview, Website Intel, Enrichment, Scoring, Memo, Competitors

Website Intel tab shows: circular score gauge (10/100), score breakdown bar chart (5 dimensions), green/red flags, GTM motion, sales signals, tech stack, product intelligence, customer validation, team intel, technical depth, traction signals, compliance & trust
Scoring tab shows: radar chart with 6 dimensions, bar chart with 6 bars including Website (pink color), investment thesis with BUY recommendation
Tab navigation works between all 6 tabs without errors
Test company TechVault AI (ID: 6988c1d18f24363888950397) exists with completed status and 65.2 score

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (All required UI components and navigation working)
